description: (See below for updates -- Please suggest your most-wished feature in the comments) Power Flashlight! is the only flashlight app you'll ever need -- and it's FREE! You can change the brightness without going to some obscure option screens like in other apps, and furthermore this flashlight always stays on without the need to continuously touch the screen! You can change the flashlight's color depending on your situation and choose between different blinking modes, including an SOS mode to ask for help and a disco mode to have fun -- all from your finger tips! UPDATES: 1.0.1: Always show the flashlight controls, even when other notifications are shown. -- This application is licensed under the GNU GPL 3.
